items.sentence: Tom was walking towards the station when I saw him.
Tom was wearing a black T-shirt and designer jeans.
Tom was whistling a song his mother had taught him.
Tom washes his face every morning before breakfast.
It looks like the thief came in through the window.
Tom fell asleep as soon as his head hit the pillow.
Tom fell asleep at the wheel and hit a street lamp.
Tom fell asleep the moment his head hit the pillow.
Tom told Mary to listen carefully, but she didn\'t.
I don\'t think I could ever get used to this smell.
